column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Just like NYC's Met
column2: you can get very lost in here.  There's a mega-ton of great work on display and a layout that boggles the mind.  As an example of the diversity
column3: my final hour was spent on the lowest level viewing Photography
column4: the Thorne Miniature Rooms collection (68 miniature rooms)
column5: and a vast Paperweight collection (the oddities apparently make it to the lower level).
